original_text: Into his right hand will come the lot for Jerusalem, where he is to set up battering rams, to give the command to slaughter, to sound the battle cry, to set battering rams against the gates, to build a ramp and to erect siege works.
korean_text: 오른손에 예루살렘으로 갈 점괘를 얻었으므로 공성퇴를 설치하며 입을 벌리고 죽이며 소리를 높여 외치며 성문을 향하여 공성퇴를 설치하고 토성을 쌓고 사다리를 세우게 되었나니

sentences.original_text: Into his right hand will come the lot for Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 오른손에 예루살렘을 위한 제비가 들어올 것이다

sentences.original_text: where he is to set up battering rams
to give the command to slaughter
to set battering rams against the gates
